resources.name: Tadoku Graded Readers
resources.nameJa: 多読グレーデッドリーダーズ
resources.description: Free graded readers for extensive reading practice.
resources.descriptionLong: Tadoku provides free graded readers at various levels for extensive reading practice. The stories are designed to be read without a dictionary, helping learners build reading fluency and confidence. Levels range from absolute beginner to advanced.
resources.notes: Excellent free resource for building reading fluency.

resources.name: Satori Reader
resources.description: Graded reading with audio and detailed explanations.
resources.descriptionLong: Satori Reader offers graded Japanese content with professional audio, grammar notes, and vocabulary support. Stories are written specifically for learners and gradually increase in difficulty. Each sentence can be broken down with detailed explanations.
resources.notes: Best graded reader platform for intermediate learners.

resources.name: NHK News Web Easy
resources.description: Simplified Japanese news articles with furigana.
resources.descriptionLong: NHK News Web Easy provides simplified versions of news articles with furigana, audio, and vocabulary highlights. It's an excellent bridge between textbook Japanese and real news content, covering current events in accessible language.
resources.notes: Updated daily with current news. Essential resource.

resources.name: Watanoc
resources.description: Japanese news for learners at multiple levels.
resources.descriptionLong: Watanoc provides Japanese news articles written at different difficulty levels. Each article includes vocabulary lists and is categorized by topic, making it easy to find content that interests you.
resources.notes: Good variety of topics and difficulty levels.

resources.name: Japanese.io Reader
resources.description: Read any Japanese text with built-in dictionary.
resources.descriptionLong: Japanese.io lets you paste any Japanese text and provides instant word lookups, grammar explanations, and flashcard creation. Great for reading native content with support when you need it.
resources.priceDetails: Free tier available. Premium for additional features.
resources.notes: Excellent for reading any Japanese content.

resources.name: Syosetu (小説家になろう)
resources.description: Free Japanese web novels for advanced reading.
resources.descriptionLong: Syosetu is Japan's largest web novel platform with thousands of free stories across all genres. While written for native speakers, it's an excellent resource for advanced learners seeking extensive reading material.
resources.notes: Huge library of free content. Many light novels started here.

resources.name: Aozora Bunko
resources.description: Free Japanese classic literature in digital format.
resources.descriptionLong: Aozora Bunko is a digital library of Japanese literature in the public domain. It includes works by famous authors like Natsume Soseki and Akutagawa Ryunosuke. Excellent for advanced learners interested in Japanese literature.
resources.notes: Classic Japanese literature. Challenging but rewarding.

resources.name: Raw Manga Resources
resources.description: Reading manga in Japanese for language practice.
resources.descriptionLong: Reading manga in Japanese is an excellent way to practice reading while enjoying engaging stories. Many manga include furigana, making them accessible to intermediate learners. Popular series are available through various legal platforms.
resources.notes: Amazon Japan Kindle has extensive manga selection.

resources.name: BookWalker
resources.description: Digital manga and light novel platform.
resources.descriptionLong: BookWalker is a major digital bookstore for manga and light novels in Japanese. The platform offers a vast selection of titles with regular sales. Great for building a digital Japanese reading library.

resources.name: Natively
resources.description: Japanese book difficulty ratings and recommendations.
resources.descriptionLong: Natively provides difficulty ratings for Japanese books, manga, and other reading materials based on community feedback. It helps learners find content at their level and track their reading progress.
resources.notes: Essential for finding books at your level.

resources.name: Yomu JP
resources.description: Graded reading articles for Japanese learners.
resources.descriptionLong: Yomu JP provides graded reading articles on various topics for Japanese learners. Articles are categorized by JLPT level and include vocabulary support.
resources.notes: Good variety of topics at different levels.

resources.name: Hukumusume Fairy Tales
resources.description: Japanese fairy tales and folk stories.
resources.descriptionLong: Hukumusume offers a collection of Japanese fairy tales and folk stories with audio. The stories use relatively simple language and provide cultural insight, making them good for intermediate reading practice.
